body:
# State of the Repo Report, May 2019

## Introduction

For all fans of statistics â enjoy! ð¤

The "median open pull request" adds 51 lines, removes 17 lines and touches 4 files.

The total set of open pull requests adds 55 802 lines, removes 20 371 lines and touches 1 969 distinct files.

The repo contains 487 553 lines of text and 1 729 files.

20 405 commits have been made of which 3 838 are merge commits.

There are currently 295 open pull requests from in total 82 contributors.

If all open pull requests were merged the project line count would grow by roughly 7 percent.

Previous edition: [State of the Repo, April 2019](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/15915)
